gpt4oMini.descriptionLong: Fast and cost-efficient model, perfect for most tasks.

gpt4o.descriptionLong: High-quality model for complex reasoning and accurate responses.

gpt5.descriptionLong: Most advanced OpenAI model with superior capabilities and reasoning.

claudeHaiku.description: NEW: Small model with big capabilities
claudeHaiku.descriptionLong: NEW: Small model with big capabilities - great value

geminiFlash.descriptionLong: Fast Google AI model with multimodal capabilities.

deepseek.descriptionLong: Advanced reasoning model with strong performance.

grok.descriptionLong: Powerful AI model from xAI with advanced capabilities.

generateImage.descriptionLong: Create stunning AI-generated images from text descriptions.

cyberpunk.name: Cyberpunk
cyberpunk.prompt: Create an image in a cyberpunk aesthetic: vivid neon accents, futuristic textures, glowing details, and high-contrast lighting.

anime.name: Anime
anime.prompt: Create an image in an anime art style: clean lines, vibrant colors, expressive characters, and detailed backgrounds with a Japanese animation aesthetic.

minimalist.name: Minimalist
minimalist.prompt: Create an image in a minimalist style: clean, simple composition with plenty of white space, limited color palette, and focus on essential elements only.

watercolor.name: Watercolor
watercolor.prompt: Create an image in a watercolor painting style: soft, flowing colors that blend naturally, visible brush strokes, and delicate, artistic textures.

vintage.name: Vintage
vintage.prompt: Create an image with a vintage aesthetic: sepia tones, aged textures, classic composition, and nostalgic mood reminiscent of old photographs.

photorealistic.name: Photorealistic
photorealistic.prompt: Create a photorealistic image: highly detailed, accurate lighting, realistic textures, and lifelike appearance as if captured by a professional camera.

abstract.name: Abstract
abstract.prompt: Create an abstract image: non-representational forms, bold colors, geometric or fluid shapes, and expressive artistic interpretation.

coloringBook.name: Coloring Book
coloringBook.prompt: Create an image in a coloring book style: black line art on white background, clear outlines, simple shapes perfect for coloring.

synthwave.name: Synthwave
synthwave.prompt: Create an image in a synthwave aesthetic: retro-futuristic 1980s vibe with neon grids, glowing sunset, vibrant magenta-and-cyan gradients, chrome highlights, and a nostalgic outrun atmosphere.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about ChatLearn
faq.question1: What can I do with this AI?
faq.answer1: You can chat, create images, write texts, learn new things, and even get coding help — all in one place.
faq.answer2: Yes. Just start typing or speaking — no setup needed.
faq.question3: Can it help me study or learn?
faq.answer3: Absolutely. The AI can explain topics, summarize notes, and answer your questions like a study buddy.
faq.question4: Can I create images with it?
faq.answer4: Yes. You can generate unique images instantly from your ideas.
faq.question5: Does it work in different languages?
faq.answer5: Yes. You can chat naturally in 50+ languages.
faq.answer6: Yes. From short messages to full articles, the AI helps you write faster and better.
faq.question7: Can I talk to it with my voice?
faq.answer7: Yes. You can use voice commands for hands-free conversations.
faq.question8: Is it good for fun too?
faq.answer8: Definitely. Chat casually, ask for jokes, or just have fun conversations.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.seoDesc: Learn how ChatLearn collects, uses, and protects your personal data. GDPR compliant privacy policy.
privacy.intro: ChatLearn is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and disclose your personal data.
privacy.dataCategories: Categories of Personal Data and Processing
privacy.acknowledgement: By accessing or using the Service, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy. Where required by applicable law, we will obtain your explicit consent before collecting or processing your personal data.
privacy.defCookieDesc: Small text file stored on your device by your browser. Used for essential operations, analytics, and preferences.
privacy.defCompanyDesc: Refers to the ChatLearn platform operated by TASOLAR (Cyprus).
privacy.defCustomerDesc: An individual or organization subscribing to or using the Service.
privacy.defDeviceDesc: Any internet-connected device (e.g., phone, tablet, computer).
privacy.defIPAddressDesc: Numeric label assigned to a device connected to the Internet (may approximate location).
privacy.defPersonalDataDesc: Any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person.
privacy.defServiceDesc: The functionality and products provided by ChatLearn via https://chatl.ai.
privacy.defThirdPartyDesc: External parties assisting us (e.g., hosting, analytics, payments, model API providers).
privacy.defUserDesc: The individual accessing or using the Service.
privacy.aiIntegrationsDesc: ChatLearn provides a unified interface to multiple AI models. Current integrations may include (subject to change):
privacy.aiDisclaimerText: ChatLearn is not affiliated with, sponsored, or endorsed by these providers. We access their technologies only via official APIs under lawful agreements. Prompts and inputs you submit may be sent to these providers only as needed to generate outputs, following this Policy.
privacy.dataCategoriesTitle: Categories of Personal Data and Processing
privacy.dataCategoriesDesc: We process personal data under GDPR lawful bases (performance of contract, legal obligation, legitimate interests, consent).
privacy.dataCategory1Data: Name, email, login identity (Google/Apple SSO), account identifiers.
privacy.dataCategory2Data: IP address, device info, browser/OS, timestamps, referral URLs, diagnostic logs.
privacy.dataCategory3Data: Session metadata, feature usage, crash/error data, model usage metrics.
privacy.dataCategory4Data: Plan tier, purchase history, invoice data, subscription status.
privacy.dataCategory4Purpose: Billing, receipts, VAT compliance, customer support.
privacy.dataCategory4Legal: Performance of a contract; legal obligation.
privacy.dataCategory5Data: Cookies, UTM parameters, engagement data, consent preferences.
privacy.marketingCustomerMatchDesc1: We may use your contact information, such as your email address or phone number, to provide you with updates, offers, and personalized recommendations related to ChatLearn and its AI products.
privacy.marketingCustomerMatchDesc2: We may also share hashed (encrypted) versions of your email address or phone number with advertising platforms such as Google Ads, Meta, or other trusted partners to show you relevant ads (Customer Match / Remarketing).
privacy.marketingCustomerMatchDesc3: You can opt out of this type of communication at any time by contacting privacy@chatl.ai or following the unsubscribe or opt-out instructions provided.
privacy.emailPhoneConsentDesc1: By creating an account or signing up for our service, you agree that ChatLearn may contact you via email, phone, or SMS for service updates, billing notices, marketing messages, or promotional offers.
privacy.emailPhoneConsentDesc2: You can withdraw your consent for marketing communications at any time by clicking "Unsubscribe" in any email, replying "STOP" to any SMS, or contacting us directly at support@chatl.ai.
privacy.useItem2: Process your AI requests and generate outputs
privacy.useItem8: Communicate with you about updates and support
privacy.howWeDiscloseDesc: We share data only as needed to operate the Service or comply with law:
privacy.discloseAIDesc: OpenAI, Anthropic, Google DeepMind, xAI, DeepSeek (for content generation).
privacy.discloseInfraDesc: Cloud hosting, CDN, DDoS protection, logging.
privacy.disclosePaymentsDesc: Stripe (billing, invoices, VAT). We do not store card data.
privacy.discloseAnalyticsDesc: Privacy-aware tools such as GA4 or other consented cookies.
privacy.discloseAuthoritiesDesc: If required by law or to protect rights and safety.
privacy.discloseTransfersDesc: In case of merger, acquisition, or reorganization, subject to this Policy.
privacy.howWeDiscloseNote: All partners are bound by confidentiality and GDPR-compliant processing agreements.
privacy.internationalDesc: We are based in Cyprus (EU), but some providers may process data outside the EEA/UK. When we transfer data, we rely on adequacy decisions or Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) with additional safeguards.
privacy.retentionDesc: We retain personal data only as long as necessary for the stated purposes or legal obligations.
privacy.retentionNote: When you delete your account, related data is deleted or anonymized within a reasonable timeframe, except where retention is required by law.
privacy.securityDesc: We use encryption (TLS), access controls, network monitoring, and backups to protect your data. While no system is 100% secure, we continuously improve our safeguards to mitigate risks.
privacy.cookiesNote: You can manage or withdraw cookie consent anytime via our on-site banner or your browser settings. Disabling certain cookies may affect functionality. For more details, see our
privacy.paymentDesc: All payments are processed securely through Stripe. We do not collect or store full card data on our servers. To manage or remove payment info, use your billing page or contact Stripe.
privacy.childrenDesc: The Service is not directed to individuals under 16. We do not knowingly collect data from minors. If you believe a child provided information, contact privacy@chatl.ai and we will delete it.
privacy.gdprRightsDesc: You may have the right to:
privacy.gdprRightsNote: To exercise these rights, email privacy@chatl.ai. You may also complain to the Office of the Commissioner for Personal Data Protection, Cyprus.
privacy.californiaRight1: Know what data we collect and how it's used
privacy.californiaRight3: Opt-out of sale/sharing (we do not sell data)
privacy.californiaNote: To exercise these rights, contact privacy@chatl.ai. We will not discriminate against you for doing so.
privacy.deleteStep1: Log in → Account Settings → Delete Account
privacy.deleteStep3: Upon confirmation, your account and related personal data will be deleted or anonymized, except where required by law
privacy.deleteNote: Backups may retain minimal encrypted data for a limited period for disaster-recovery only. Deletion is permanent and ends all active subscriptions. Refunds follow our Refund Policy.
privacy.changesDesc: We may update this Policy to reflect service or legal changes. We will notify users of significant updates where required by law. Continued use after changes take effect means acceptance.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.seoDesc: Terms and conditions for using ChatLearn AI platform. Learn about our service agreements, user rights, and platform policies.
terms.whoWeAreDesc: ChatLearn ("we," "us," or "our") is an advanced AI platform that unifies access to multiple world-class Large Language Models (LLMs) and text-to-image systems under one secure interface and membership.
terms.currentIntegrations: Our current integrations include (subject to change):
terms.gpt5: GPT-5, GPT-4o, GPT-4o mini by OpenAI
terms.disclaimerP1: ChatLearn is an independent platform and is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or endorsed by any of the AI model providers integrated into the Service.
terms.disclaimerP2: This includes, but is not limited to: OpenAI, Anthropic, Google DeepMind, xAI, DeepSeek, and Stability AI.
terms.disclaimerP3: All trademarks, brand names, and model names such as GPT-5, Claude Haiku 4.5, Gemini 2.5 Flash, Grok 4, DeepSeek V2, and DALL-E 3 are the property of their respective owners.
terms.disclaimerP4: ChatLearn accesses these technologies exclusively through official APIs and legitimate service agreements, ensuring compliant and secure usage.
terms.disclaimerP5: We do not claim ownership, partnership, or operational control over any third-party models or providers.
terms.disclaimerP6: Our mission is to provide users with a unified, reliable interface to access multiple AI systems efficiently and securely.
terms.generalP1: By using ChatLearn ("the App," "the Platform," or "the Service"), you agree to these Terms of Use ("Terms") and our Privacy Policy.
terms.generalP2: If you do not agree, you must not use the Service.
terms.generalP3: Continued use of ChatLearn constitutes acceptance of these Terms and any updates made to them.
terms.generalP4: ChatLearn shall not be liable for any direct or indirect damages, including data loss, revenue loss, or service interruptions.
terms.generalP5: We reserve the right to modify pricing, plans, or usage policies at any time.
terms.licenseP1: ChatLearn grants you a revocable, non-exclusive, non-transferable, limited license to use the Service strictly in accordance with these Terms.
terms.licenseP2: All rights not expressly granted are reserved by ChatLearn and its licensors.
terms.restrictionsIntro: You agree not to, and will not permit others to:
terms.restriction1: License, sell, rent, or distribute the Service;
terms.restriction2: Copy, modify, or create derivative works of the platform;
terms.restriction3: Reverse-engineer or attempt to extract model data or API code;
terms.restriction6: Use ChatLearn to create competing AI services;
terms.restriction7: Use outputs for unlawful, harmful, or deceptive purposes.
terms.restrictionsWarning: Violation of these restrictions may result in immediate account termination.
terms.suggestionsDesc: Any feedback, comments, or ideas ("Suggestions") you provide shall be the exclusive property of ChatLearn, which may use them freely without credit or compensation.
terms.thirdPartyP1: ChatLearn integrates external AI models and APIs, including OpenAI, Anthropic, Google DeepMind, xAI, DeepSeek, and Stability AI.
terms.thirdPartyP2: While we strive to maintain consistent access to all integrations, their continued availability depends on third-party providers.
terms.modelPoint1: The list of supported models may change at any time.
terms.modelPoint2: ChatLearn may add, suspend, or remove any model, feature, or integration temporarily or permanently at its sole discretion.
terms.modelPoint3: These changes may result from API cost changes, provider limitations, compliance obligations, or technical considerations.
terms.modelPoint4: Such changes do not entitle users to refunds, compensation, or claims, as long as the core Service remains functional.
terms.modelPoint5: Replacement or updated models with equivalent or enhanced capabilities may be introduced without notice.
terms.modelEfforts: We will make reasonable efforts to inform users about significant model changes.
terms.cookiesP1: We use cookies and analytics tools to operate, secure, and improve our platform.
terms.cookiesP2: You can manage or disable cookies at any time through your browser or consent manager.
terms.cookiesP3: Please see our Privacy Policy for full details.
terms.subscriptionP1: Certain features of ChatLearn are available through a paid subscription plan.
terms.subscriptionP2: Subscriptions renew automatically unless canceled before the renewal date.
terms.subscriptionP3: Payments are non-refundable except as required by law.
terms.freeTrialP1: ChatLearn may offer a limited free trial (e.g., up to 3 messages) per user for evaluation purposes.
terms.freeTrialP2: The free trial is subject to fair-use and anti-abuse measures (including device, IP, and account checks). We may modify, suspend, or end the free trial at any time. Once the free quota is exhausted, continued use requires an active paid plan.
terms.fairUseIntro: ChatLearn operates under a fair use policy to maintain platform stability and ensure equitable access for all users.
terms.fairUse1: Each subscription plan includes specific resource limits (such as message volume, token count, or image generations).
terms.fairUse2: ChatLearn continuously monitors system usage to detect excessive or disproportionate activity.
terms.fairUse3: If your usage significantly exceeds your plan's fair-use limits, ChatLearn may:
terms.fairUse3a: (a) temporarily restrict or throttle your access;
terms.fairUse3b: (b) offer an upgrade to a higher-capacity plan; or
terms.fairUse3c: (c) apply additional charges based on excess usage.
terms.fairUse4: Any additional charges will be communicated transparently via email, invoice, or within your account dashboard prior to billing.
terms.fairUse5: Continued or repeated overuse without resolution may result in suspension or termination of your account.
terms.fairUse6: Usage metrics and thresholds are determined internally by ChatLearn and may evolve over time as system capacity or model costs change.
terms.fairUse7: These measures are in place to maintain a stable and cost-efficient experience for all users.
terms.companyInfoP1: The ChatLearn platform is operated by TASOLAR, a company registered in the Republic of Cyprus.
terms.companyAddress: Dimostheni Severi & Katsoni 2, Avenue Court, 1082 Nicosia, Cyprus

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.seoDesc: Learn how ChatLearn uses cookies and similar technologies. Understand your choices and how to manage cookie preferences.
cookiePolicy.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how ChatLearn uses cookies and similar technologies on our website.
cookiePolicy.consentText: By continuing to browse or use the Site, you consent to the use of cookies as described in this policy.
cookiePolicy.disagreeText: If you do not agree, you can manage or disable cookies through your browser settings or via the cookie banner displayed when you first visit our Site.
cookiePolicy.whatAreCookiesDesc: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They are used to make websites function properly, improve performance, remember preferences, and help us understand how visitors interact with the site.
cookiePolicy.sessionCookiesDesc: Deleted when you close your browser
cookiePolicy.persistentCookiesDesc: Remain stored for a defined period
cookiePolicy.cookieTypesNote: Cookies set directly by ChatLearn are known as "first-party cookies," while those set by external tools like Google Analytics are "third-party cookies."
cookiePolicy.howWeUseDesc: We use cookies to provide a secure, optimized, and personalized experience on our Site.
cookiePolicy.essentialDesc: These are required for the basic operation of the website, such as security, login, and navigation. Without them, the site cannot function properly.
cookiePolicy.analyticsDesc: We use Google Analytics (GA4) to collect anonymous information about how visitors use the site — such as pages viewed, session duration, and user behavior. This helps us improve performance and user experience.
cookiePolicy.functionalDesc: These cookies remember your preferences (like language or theme) to provide a smoother, customized browsing experience.
cookiePolicy.marketingDesc: If Meta Pixel or similar tracking tools are active, these cookies help deliver relevant ads and measure campaign effectiveness. They track general interactions and conversions anonymously.
cookiePolicy.managingDesc: When you first visit our Site, you may see a banner asking for your consent to use cookies.
cookiePolicy.browserSettings: You can also adjust your preferences anytime through your browser's cookie settings. Most browsers allow you to delete existing cookies or block new ones.
cookiePolicy.disablingWarning: Please note that disabling cookies may affect certain site features or reduce performance.
cookiePolicy.thirdPartyDesc: Some cookies are set by trusted third parties who help us analyze traffic and improve functionality.
cookiePolicy.googleAnalyticsDesc: for tracking and measuring website usage.
cookiePolicy.googleTagManagerDesc: for managing and deploying analytics scripts.
cookiePolicy.metaPixelDesc: for advertising analytics and conversion tracking.
cookiePolicy.thirdPartyCollect: These providers may collect information like your IP address, browser type, or session details.
cookiePolicy.updatesDesc: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect new technologies, features, or legal requirements. The "Last Updated" date at the top of this page indicates the latest revision.
cookiePolicy.checkOccasionally: We recommend checking this page occasionally to stay informed about how we use cookies.
cookiePolicy.contactDesc: If you have any questions or concerns about this Cookie Policy or how we handle your data, please contact us:

refundPolicy.title: Refund Policy
refundPolicy.seoDesc: ChatLearn refund policy explaining conditions for refund requests, consumer rights, and our commitment to customer satisfaction.
refundPolicy.intro: Thank you for choosing ChatLearn. This Refund Policy explains the conditions under which users may request a refund for payments made on our website.
refundPolicy.euConsumers: European Union, United Kingdom, and Cyprus Consumers
